website_summaries.verdict: Those seeking a unique take on the dish-shaped bungee chair should check out these multi-colored choices from Impact Canopy.
pros: Available in a variety of fun color options
Easily folds away for simple storage and traveling portability
Made from high quality steel and fabric
cons: Some customers had problems with the chair being too small for male adults

customer_reviews.title: Stong and cute
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this chair, I bought it for myself but often find someone sitting on it, I wasn't sure if it would hold up very well, but it's still strong and doing it's job. Will be ordering a pink one for my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Maria💫

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to fold/unfold. The frame seems sturdy but the material is not. Used one time, in dry weather and it started to rip. I’m not an obese person either, so weight was not an issue. I have no little kids so that’s not a factor.
customer_reviews.author: ipeasmom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First, we received the wrong color. Not a huge problem because my son didn't seem to care. Second, it's already broken. This was purchased less than three months ago. The fabric is ripping and a few of the bungee cords have snapped. Too dangerous to sit in at this point. My son is of average height and weight for a tween.
customer_reviews.author: M N

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for some extra seating in my college apartment. Not only is this chair extremely comfortable, but it is quite stylish. It’s perfect for a movie chair, or for a chair that you could get a couple of eliminations in while playing fortnite. I am extremely happy with my purchase and will likely buy more for my friends and family, so they too can enjoy the comforts of this soft and stylish chair.
customer_reviews.author: John Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter loves this chair. She sits comfortably. Chair is easy to fold and move from one location to another.
customer_reviews.author: fun

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Works for my 150 lb boy though super noisy sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Ages 12 and up
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this chair! Very sturdy and big enough for an adult. Probably need to weigh at least 60lbs to get the seat to go down.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not really impressed. Doesn’t have a lot of give. Didn’t work for my 70lb son, he slide out. Going off to college with my son for there house.
customer_reviews.author: Tara W

customer_reviews.title: Nogood
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter she don’t use it says it not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sink in very much.
customer_reviews.text: The design makes it so you can’t really sink in very much :/
customer_reviews.author: manau

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and well made, but could be less taut
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfy and well made but I really wish it would hang lower when you sit in it. It’s a little too taut for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Fun chair for kids or small adult
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this. We are using it in the house for video games and hope to take it outside this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bungee chair!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick! Exactly what I was looking for...nice construction and lightweight. Will be ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair for teen son’s Brewers baseball themed room
customer_reviews.text: Got for Christmas gift for my son... it’s a little tight yet but he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: AmyZ

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift and the person that received it just loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the person that received it just loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Clarahan

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong color. Still a great chair!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son received this as a gift today. It's a great chair but, they sent the wrong color. Was ordered in Blue Camo and they sent this Army-ish Camo pattern that's not even listed. It's no big deal though because he loves the chair.
customer_reviews.author: woods

product_meta.title: Impact Canopy 0460020015VC Folding Bungee Chair, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownImpact Canopy Round Bungee ChairThis comfy saucer chair is the latest trend in portable seating. Its flexible bungee web support provides comfortable seating anywhere, anytime. The combination of heavy-duty polyester fabric and bungee flexible web support holds more weight than other styles (225 lbs.) with a 100% bungee/net design. It is designed to fold flat for easy storage and portability. The overall comfort, affordability, ease of use, and design makes a bungee chair from Impact Canopy a great choice for your seating needs. This modern ergonomic Impact Bungee Chair is the perfect take anywhere chair!Durable 600D fabricHigh strength steel tube frameSeat 13" off the groundOpen size: 32" x 32" x 27"Folded size: 32 x 32 x 3Holds up to 225 lbs.Lightweight and portable chair only weighs 7.7 lbs.
feature_bullets: MULTIPLE USES: Round bungie chairs can be used for dorm rooms, kids and teen rooms, camping, living room, parties or sporting events
PORTABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Bungee chair folds flat for easy storage and is lightweight for easy carrying
ERGONOMIC BENEFITS: Flexible bungie cords provide support, air flow and long-term comfort
HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION: Bungee chair is constructed of durable bungie cords, high strength steel tube frame and 600 weight denier fabric for years of use
IMPACT CANOPIES WARRANTY: 6 months limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
